replies.message:
ATTENTION EMINEM FANS!!!!!!

I have started a petition to bring the rap god back to the UK for another tour!!!

There are enough of us Eminem fans to make this happen!!!!

Literally takes 1 minute to sign or less!!!!

Sign and share for a once in a lifetime experience!!!!

https://www.change.org/p/marshall-mathers-eminem-me-and-many-others-would-love-it-if-you-could-do-one-last-tour-in-the-uk-as-thousands-of-us-missed-your-two-night-stint-at-wembley-in-2014-we-just-want-one-last-chance-to-see-a-rap-legend-live-before-you-leave-the-game-for-goo?recruiter=350307000&utm_source=share_petition&utm_medium=copylink
